name: Cavy Bat 2
description:
You are a bat lost in a valley with a medieval city. A mysterious voice is guiding you promising a new home and a great award, when you finish all missions.

Tilt your device to steer in the air, hunt fire flies, find magical fruit to learn magic and use it to shoot scorpions or birds. Take part in timed races and compete on leader boards.

After completing all missions you will resolve the mystery of a voice, which guided you through the whole adventure.

Please, rate and comment, if you want think this adventure needs more missions. There are 11 missions so far but, if we hear from many players, we will make more missions with the master and his bat!

There is only one in app purchase: to disable ads. Otherwise ads show only, when you lose.

Music:

Mysterioso March Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
